Text:
XAMPP is not "php webserver". It is a distribution of the Apache server with buil-in php, mysql, perl etc, for those who are not comfortable in dealing with these complex things manualy. It is FREE, and can be downloaded from sourceforge any time, without requiring any SEEDER. For details visit the home page:
http://www.apachefriends.org/en/xampp-windows.html
